author: KinoCheck.com
description:
This time in the #KinoCheckNews “Shin Godzilla”, “Godzilla Minus One”, “Avengers: Secret Wars”, “Judge Dredd”, “Evil Dead Burn”, “Captain Planet”, “Resident Evil”, Pirates of the Caribbean 6", “Zelda” etc.| App ➤ https://KinoCheck.com/App | Best Movie News Show | All News https://KinoCheck.com/news

00:00 Godzilla Franchise
The American MonsterVerse has its merits, but in recent years, Japan has also made a striking comeback with spectacular Godzilla films: "Shin Godzilla" and "Godzilla Minus One" offer two completely different interpretations of the iconic atomic lizard. Now, there's exciting news: Sequels to both movies are in the pipeline!

01:37 Judge Dredd Reboot
"Judge Dredd" was last seen maintaining law and order on the big screen in 2012. Now, a new movie is in the pipeline – and none other than Taika Waititi is set to direct.

02:49 The Future of the MCU
"Thunderbolts" and "Captain America 4" underperformed at the box office, while things are currently looking more promising
title: THE BEST MOVIE NEWS 2025: New Godzilla Movies, MCU Reboot, Resident Evil, Judge Dredd, Wonder Woman

author: KinoCheck.com
description:
Official Peacemaker Series Trailer 2 2025 | More ➤ https://KinoCheck.com/App | John Cena Series Trailer | Max: 21 Aug 2025 | Details ➤ https://KinoCheck.com/show/93x/peacemaker-2022?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=description
The continuing story of Peacemaker – a compellingly vainglorious man who believes in peace at any cost, no matter how many people he has to kill to get it – in the aftermath of the events of “The Suicide Squad.”

Peacemaker (2025) is the new action series by Jody Hill, Brad Anderson & Rosemary Rodriguez, starring John Cena, Danielle Brooks and Freddie Stroma.

Note | #Peacemaker #Trailer courtesy of Warner Bros. Pictures Germany. | All Rights Reserved. #KinoCheck®
title: PEACEMAKER Season 2 Official Trailer 2 (2025) John Cena
